General.Name: ShenZhen Zero-Seven Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Quanxinhao Co., Ltd. engages in property leasing and management business in China and internationally. It also engages in real estate development, mineral resource development, and information technology businesses. In addition, the company is involved in self-owned housing rental; property management and parking business; and sale of daily necessities, as well as disinfection and sterilization paper towels. Further, it engages in sale of spare parts and automobile, as well as provision of vehicle after-sales repair, maintenance, and other corresponding services. Additionally, the company engages in the import and export trade, and investment activities. Shenzhen Quanxinhao Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Chen  Weibin
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
